projects.title: Task Flow Manager
projects.description: A Trello-inspired task management app that allows users to create boards, lists, and draggable task cards. Includes user authentication, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: An interactive dashboard to track income, expenses, and budgets. Includes visual charts, monthly analytics, goal tracking, and categorized spending insights. Designed for intuitive personal finance control.

projects.title: Personal Blog CMS
projects.description: A full-featured personal blog where the admin can write, edit, and publish blog posts via a custom CMS dashboard. Includes rich text editor, SEO-friendly routing, and public viewing.
